description: Known phantom positions from Sierra Chart that should be filtered out

F.US.MESM25.reason: Historical ghost position from Sierra Chart

notes: Phantom positions are positions that Sierra Chart reports as open but are actually closed.
This typically happens with historical data or Sierra Chart bugs.
Each entry maps symbol -> {qty, avg_entry, reason, date_added}
If both qty and avg_entry match exactly, the position is filtered out.
